data.summary: With Weni Web Chat, you can integrate your project as a chat on your website.
data.description: Use Weni Web Chat to have a humanized automation experience of Weni Platform directly on your website or web platform. By integrating it, you can customize aspects of the Webchat such as Color, the timing between messages, message indicators, avatar, and more! Thus, guaranteeing everything that Weni Platform has to offer with your's brand identity.

config.script_tutorial: To install Weni Web Chat on your website, copy and paste this code above the last </body> on your website.
config.initPayloadToolTip: When opening the chat on your website, a trigger with this value will be called automatically to start a chosen flow. You can configure it on Studio.

data.summary: Send and receive messages from Telegram users for free.
data.description: By using Telegram, you are connecting one of the largest messaging applications as a channel available to your audience on the Weni Platform. Send and receive texts, videos and audio through this channel, ensuring the comfort and community of your audience, as well as the resources available on the platform.

data.summary: With WhatsApp Demo you can bring the best of WhatsApp, the biggest chat app in the world, for free to validate your project.
data.description:
With WhatsApp Demo you can bring the best of WhatsApp, the biggest chat app in the world, for free to validate your project. With a free shared number you can test with up to 200 monthly users all the features available on the platform, as well as validate the operation and service of your business through this channel.
Obs.:
- Does not support customizations (photo, description, number, etc)
- Does not support template messages and all conversations must be initiated by the user

data.summary: If you have an enterprise WhatsApp account, you can connect it to communicate with your contacts
data.description:
WhatsApp is the largest messaging application in the world and one of the most preferred by users.

Its integration with the Weni Platform allows you to connect your business number to the application and create intelligent flows to meet the needs of your customers.

You can use this integration on the Weni Platform without having the verified business manager and start up to 50 conversations by the business with different numbers within 24h. Even without having the verified deal manager, you can have up to two numbers per WABA.

The first 1,000 conversations each month are free. That way, you can create experiences that customers will love before they pay for it. Each WhatsApp Business (WABA) account will receive 1,000 free conversations per month that can be initiated by the business (if you do not have the verified manager, you must pay attention to the limitation of 50 conversations with different numbers) or by the user. This benefit is provided at the WABA level. So even if the account has multiple numbers attached, the free chat limit will still be 1,000. The free conversations limit is reset each month according to the time zone associated with WABA.

Also, remembering that with the free plan of Weni Platform you can communicate with 200 active contacts (unique contacts in 1 month interval) at no cost.

By checking the business manager you can unlock even more the potential of your WhatsApp integration, such as increasing the conversation tier initiated by the business (1000, 10,000, 100,000 or unlimited), Possibility of acquiring the OBA (official account seal/green ticket) and having more than two numbers per WABA.

This version of the WhatsApp API through the Weni Platform it supports customizations, such as photos, videos, sending files, descriptions and message templates (conversations can be initiated by the user or by the business).

setup.description: Follow the steps and integrate with WhatsApp

configuration_guide.CT: To connect a Clickatell number, first create an HTTP integration for a two way number, then enter the number and API key below.
configuration_guide.FCM: You can to connect using a Firebase Cloud Messaging App to your workspace to automate sending notifications. You will need to create a new App on Firebase Console and get its key. To do so:
configuration_guide.FC:
You can connect a FreshChat Account to your account to automate sending and receiving messages via FreshChat. This will also support Apple Business Chat if it's been configured on your FreshChat account.

Each message sent to the channel will have a URN in the format channel-uuid/user-uuid where the channel UUID is the FreshChat channel's UUID.

  1. In the FreshChat web interface, under Settings, API Tokens, select Generate Token. Once the token is created you'll enter it below.
  2. Under Settings again, select Webhooks and copy the Public Key and paste it below. This assures all webhook request from FreshChat will be authenticated.
  3. Lastly, you'll need the UUID of the Agent that Weni will use when it sends FreshChat message. This is available via the FreshChat API.
  4. Once you press Submit below with all the information configured, the confirmation page will give you the URL to use for the FreshChat Webhooks. Enter this URL on the Settings page, under Webhooks where the Public Key was copied from before.
configuration_guide.IB:
You can connect your Infobip number by entering your number, username and password here.

After connecting your service we will provide URLs for the endpoints for InfoBip to call when they want to push a message to Rapidpro.
configuration_guide.JC:
You can connect a JioChat Channel to your workspace to automate sending and receiving JioChat messages.

To start copy the App ID and App Secret from the Developer Center into the form below and click Save.
configuration_guide.JN: Enter your credentials to add your number.
configuration_guide.MB: Enter your credentials to add your number.
configuration_guide.SL:
You can connect a Slack Bot to your workspace to automate sending and receiving messages.

To do it, you will need to create a new slack app and configure it.
  1. You'll need to create a Slack app if you haven't already, setup a bot to it, add the needed scopes and install app on your slack workspace. If you need help how to do this, read this guide here.
configuration_guide.TM: You can connect a Teams Bot to your Rapidpro workspace to automate sending and receiving Teams messages. For this, you will need to create and register a Bot-type application in Microsoft Azure.
configuration_guide.TMS:
You can add your Twilio Messaging SID as a channel. You can get your messaging Service SID or create a new messaging service from Twilio Console

After adding your Twilio Messaging Service SID we will provide you with the URL endpoint for Twilio to call when they want to push a message to Weni.
configuration_guide.TW: You can add a TwiML REST API as a channel using your TwiML instance.
configuration_guide.VP:
In order to connect your public Viber page to Weni you will need to create a public channel and follow the steps necessary to get an authentication token. Please consult the Viber developers documentation on how to create your own public account.

Once you have your authentication token, enter it below to connect your public channel to Weni

data.summary: Now you can raise the level and potential of your service by creating a channel that integrates your Instagram to Weni Platform
data.description:
Instagram has already reached the milestone of 1.4 billion active users, with more than 500 million browsing assiduously every day, seeking not only interaction, but looking for services and products.

Now, imagine if your institution is not present, active and efficient on this channel? This is no longer a mere social network to share photos and videos of the routine, but rather a showcase of doing business and important partnerships.

And now you can raise the level and potential of your service by creating a channel that integrates your Instagram to Weni Platform.

This creates more engagement and interaction with your followers and potential customers and partners, increasing the chances of closing new projects while reducing operational costs with service.

data.summary: If you have a CRM at Omie, you can integrate with the Weni Platform and automate actions in your CRM through your chatbot
data.description:
If you have a CRM at Omie, you can integrate with the Weni Platform and automate actions in your CRM through your chatbot.

By integrating the weni platform with your CRM on Omie you will be able to perform actions such as:

- Include Opportunities in the CRM
- Search Title and Releases
- List customers

Here in the Integrations module, you must perform the Integration with Omie providing the API Key and API Secret data and then perform the integration.
After that, just go to the flows module, create a flow and then you will have a card available called External Services, in which you will be able to perform all the actions with Omie's CRM mentioned here.

config.description: Learn more about integrating with Omie here

errors.configure: An error occurred while trying to configure the service, please try again later

app_selection.title: Integrate a channel to your project
app_selection.description: Choose the channel you want to use and follow the step by step to add it. It's fast and easy.

descriptions.first:
1. On the WhatsApp card, look for the "+" button and click on it.
  2. Next, a window will appear asking if you want to connect your WhatsApp account with Facebook.
  3. Log in to your Facebook and click "Start" to be redirected to the next page.
  4. Oh, and don't worry about the requested permissions. They are needed so that we can help you even more!
descriptions.second:
1. Now it's time to fill in your company details.
  2. Create or select a profile for your WhatsApp Bussines, this account will belong to your target business account .
  3. Add the phone number that people will use to chat with you on WhatsApp.
  4. After that enter your number and fill in the verification code field that will be sent to you.
descriptions.third:
1. After making these settings, a new Weni Platform screen will appear. Just click Create Channel.
  2. Your channel is now integrated with WhatsApp and ready to be customized.
  3. To customize, click on the WhatsApp card that displays your business number .
  4. Then you can customize the name and description.

descriptions.first:
1. Let's go! Open your Telegram and search for "@BotFather".
  2. Then send “/newbot”, choose a Username (usernames must always end with “_bot”, Eg:. test_bot).
  3. With these steps completed, you will receive a token.
  4. On the Weni Platform, access the integrations module, and click on the “+” on the telegram card, then you will be redirected to my applications.
descriptions.second:
1. Find the Telegram card and click on it. A sidebar will open on the right side of the page.
  2. Paste the token @BotFather sent you in the field provided. Then click "validate".
  3. Your bot will be created with the name you chose.
  4. To access the bot in Telegram, just search for the name you defined in the search field. Done!

descriptions.first:
1. Under communication channels, click Weni Web Chat.
  2. Click the "Add" button in the upper right corner of the screen.
  3. Now you can customize your bot, choosing the colors, the name and the messages it will send.
  4. Finally, access the "Script Code" section and copy the code that appears there. Paste it above the </body> tag on your site.

wwc.title: How to Integrate Weni Web Chat

data.summary: Powerful integration: Weni + ChatGPT. Automated support with a human touch, instant responses, and personalized experience. Try it now!
data.description:
We present a powerful synergy between the Weni platform and ChatGPT - a perfect combination to transform your customer interactions into an unparalleled experience!

With the integration of Weni and ChatGPT, you have at your disposal an intelligent virtual assistant powered by OpenAI's advanced natural language technology. Imagine fully automated customer support that still feels human and personalized.

Our Weni platform, known for its intuitive interface and versatile features, now strengthens its capabilities with the presence of ChatGPT. With it, you can provide your customers with instant, accurate, and engaging responses to their questions and needs, anytime and anywhere.

ChatGPT understands the nuances of human language, continuously learning and adapting. It not only offers quick and efficient answers but also maintains natural and relevant conversations, establishing a genuine connection with your customers.

Take advantage of the benefits of this integration to enhance customer support, automate repetitive tasks, and deliver a personalized and pleasant experience. ChatGPT, powered by Weni, helps you increase efficiency, save time, and achieve exceptional customer satisfaction.

Try the Weni + ChatGPT integration now and enjoy intelligent, dynamic customer support tailored to your business needs. Join this revolution in customer interaction and watch your results reach new heights!
